name: DigiSarathi
body:
### Welcome to the **DigiSarathi** website.
We are well versed in the art of software product design. We build websites, mobile apps & other online solutions to achieve better efficiency and accuracy.

Most of our work is based on open source technologies. We adopt light-weight Agile processes to keep our solutions relevant to business needs and insights. 

Our primary focus is on social impact projects. [Portfolio](http://digisarathi.com/work). 

### Past Work Highlights

* Non-profit
    * [Aarambh India](www.aarambhindia.org)
    * [Population First](http://alumni.laadli.org/)
    * [WaterAid India](www.wateraidindia.in)

* Corporate
    * Innovsource Pvt. Ltd - 10000+ downloads, 4.2 on 5 ratings - [Mobile App] (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.digisarathi.InnovApp&hl=en)

### Contact Us
You may email us on <hello@digisarathi.com> or call on +91 9022465676.
